Package cellularAutomata.graphics

Class Summary
AboutDialog Displays an "about" dialog.
AdditionalPropertiesTabPanel The panel that contains any additional properties specified by the author of the CA rule.
AllPanel Creates the display area for all of the buttons and other controls.
AllPanelController Controls interactions between components on the panels.
AllPanelListener Listens for events from the GUI components.
AnalysisPanel The panel that contains the analysis selections.
CAFrame The cellular automata graphics.
CAFrameComponentListener Reacts to the CA application frame being resized.
CAFrameListener Behavior when the CA window is closed.
CAMenuBar Creates a menu bar for the CA, including, exit, save, print, etc.
CATabbedPaneUI A UI for tabbed panes.
CAToolBar A tool bar that displays images for buttons.
DescriptionPanel The panel that contains a description of the currently active CA rule.
InitialStatesPanel The JPanel/tab that contains all of the initial state choices such as blank, random, etc.
PropertiesPanel The JPanel that contains all of the CA Properties such as lattice type, lattice size, etc.
RulePanel The tab that contains the rule and its description.
RuleTree Creates a tree for selecting CA rules.
StartPanel The panel that contains the start and stop buttons.
StatusPanel The panel that contains status messages.
